name: Rhyme Storm
description:
Rhyme Storm is the world's first freestyle rapping rhythm game, a wholly new experience that challenges you to stay on your toes and on the beat as you deftly string together hard-hitting punchlines. It's packed with awesome beats, hilarious topics, and mind blowing visuals that dance and pulse to your performance. You won't be asking if you can freestyle rap -- you'll be wondering how fast you can go!

Features

  • A New Experience: The world's first freestyle rapping rhythm game
  • Test your Might: See how well you’re doing in real time
  • Killer Soundtrack: 20 awesome beats in various styles and speeds
  • Find your Groove: Visual guides make it easy to get on beat
  • Hypnotizing Graphics: Dozens of interactive light shows that respond to the music and your performance
  • Get Pumped: Your own personal hype man, backing you up and pushing you on
  • Laugh your butt off: Over 10,000 hilarious topics with custom rhymes
  • Track your mastery: Detailed stats on your rapping like your average word length, number of unique words, and your peak words per minute!
